titles.title: I've got my mind made up
Born again

verse.name: v1
c1
verse.lines:
Goodbye world, I stay no longer with you
Goodbye pleasures of sin, I stay no longer with you
God's way the rest of my life

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
// Born, born, born again Thank
God, I'm born again //

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
// Born of the water, spirit and the blood
Thank God, I'm born again //
